DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to provide anidulafungin and voriconazole to healthy subjects to determine the drug concentration in the lung.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess The Anidulafungin And Voriconazole Concentration In Lung Following Intravenous Administration In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult subjects willing to comply with the study requirement. Clinical significant disease. Sensitive to study medication. Not willing to comply with the study requirement.
